main event: Several unidentified flying objects were reported over Randolph AFB, Texas, on July 21 and 22, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a domed shape and emitting a silver color., Witnesses observed the objects for several seconds flying in straight lines and making sharp turns., No photographs were taken during the sightings, and no identification or interception actions were initiated., The sightings coincided with military traffic from B-29s practicing landings at Randolph AFB., Witnesses included civilians familiar with military and civilian aircraft.
witness description: Civilians, including the wife of a military captain and steelworkers.
